name: Giggles Premium Baby Diaper 2 Mini (3-6 kg)
description:
This product is manufactured/packaged in India and its raw materials are collected from Turkey. Giggles Premium’ is the brand of high-quality baby diapers of Sevincler Health Products Inc. Specifications of ‘Giggles Baby belt diaper: -Textile back sheet with figures, amazing design,  -Super absorbent green layer to acquire and distribute the liquid super quickly,  -Strong elastic side tapes that can be opened and reattached as many times as needed, -Tissue to keep the core of the diaper stable, -Textile frontal tape with figures, -Super absorbent particles that emit and hold the liquid inside.

name: MamyPoko Pants Extra Absorb Diapers Pant S (4-8) kg
description:
This product is manufactured/packaged in Japan and its raw materials are collected from India. MamyPoko Pants Extra Absorb comes with "Widespread Crisscross Sheet" with 50% extra absorption area on sides that absorbs urine "+30% more quickly and repeatedly" for upto 12 hours. It prevents leakage without heaviness so the baby & mother sleep peacefully the whole night.

name: MamyPoko Pants Diaper Extra Absorb Pant New Born (0-5 kg)
description:
Now, the ease and comfort of MamyPoko Pants is also available for your new baby! While ordinary diapers have tapes that may harm your baby's sensitive skin, MamyPoko Pants is a Pant Style Diaper with Soft Elastic and No tapes. It is as gentle on a baby's skin as a mother's touch and is easy to wear too, just like a panty. So, start early, start right with MamyPoko Pants Extra Small for your new baby.

name: Bashundhara Baby Diaper Belt M (4-9 kg)
description:
Super Absorbent Polymers: Absorbs liquid rapidly and locks it into the diaper. It keeps baby's skin dry by keeping liquid away. • Leak-proof Barriers: Special developed barriers help to prevent leakage from the legs • Extra Stretch Side Bands: Improved extra elastic side bands provide comfort and freedom of movements. • Anatomical Structure: It's designed to fit baby's body perfectly. • Soft Textile Surface: Since it is soft and breathable, it prevents baby from rash and irritation. • Cottony Touch: It has a soft inner surface to make your baby's sensitive skin comfortable. Super Absorbent Polymers: Absorbs liquid rapidly and locks it into the diaper. It keeps baby's skin dry by keeping liquid away. Extra Stretch Side Bands: Improved extra elastic side bands provide comfort and freedom of movements.

name: SMC Smile Baby Diaper Pants S (4-8 kg)
description:
SMC brings Smile baby diaper made of ultra soft sheets for the maximum comfort of your baby. Its leg cuffs and high absorption system prevent leakage. Its super gel technology protects baby’s skin from germ by performing the fastest and maximum absorption. Flexi ear and waist band let baby move comfortably. It has wetness mark to indicate when it’s time to change. This diaper guarantees 12 hours of protection. Manufacturer: SMC enterprise ltd.

name: Kidstar Baby Belt Diaper M (6-11 kg)
description:
Kidstar baby diaper comes with unique elastic waist band to fit with baby's body perfectly and avoid leakage. Its cottony soft topsheet keeps baby dry and minimizes diaper rash. Breathable back layer promotes air circulation effectively. Its acquisition distribution layer helps liquid diffuse,keeps liquid away from skin,keeps skin dry and clean. 360 degree core double leak guard avoids side leakage. Wetness indicator reminds mother when to change diaper. Manufacturer: Advance personal care Ltd.    Size: M  Allowable weight of baby 6-11 kg Quantity: 30 pcs Wetness indicator: Yes Belt system  Only Diaper in Bangladesh which have 360˚ Degree Leak Guard to avoid side leakage

name: Kidz Baby Diaper Belt M (5-10 kg)
description:
This product is manufactured/packaged in India and its raw materials are collected from China. Kidz baby diapers are based on German technology. Its Japanese absorbent paper ensures maximum absorbency.    A big elastic waistband fits with the baby's body perfectly. The traceless magic belt makes the diaper easy to put on. The beehive surface is ultra-soft and skin-friendly. The 3-dimensional leak guard prevents leakage. These diapers are free from latex, fragrance, chlorine, phthalate, and petroleum-based lotion. A wetness indicator is there to show the mother when it is time for a change.   Manufacturer: Talzons & Next G  Size:M  Allowable weight of the baby: 5-10 kg  Quantity: 62 Pcs  Wetness indicator: Yes  Belt system  FDA approved.  This highly absorbent Kidz Newborn diaper helps to keep your baby's skin dry & fresh. Ensure your baby's comfort and uninterrupted sound sleep, keep dry throughout daily adventure. Especially assists mother and baby during whole night and outdoor travel.
This product is manufactured/packaged in India and its raw materials are collected from China.

name: Supermom Baby Diaper Belt S (3-8 kg)
description:
Square Toiletries Ltd. has brought for you the high quality diaper named "Supermom" in the market. It has 80% more absorbent than other diapers that you can compare with more than international brands. Supermom ensures zero leakage as it has hydrophobic leg cuff. Its cottony top sheet ensures that children can sleep comfortably the whole night.
